name: Renee Okhiria
bio: Dr. Renée Okhiria is a qualified medical doctor with an MBBS from the University of Manchester and a BSc from Imperial College London. She holds advanced certification in aesthetic medicine, with a focus on non-surgical facial rejuvenation. Known for her artistic eye and meticulous technique, Dr. Renée combines medical precision with creative vision to deliver refined, natural-looking results.
